mapper.select: select id from unit where city is not null

select u.id as Id, u.unit_name as UnitName, u.province as Province, u.city as City, u.in_net_date as InNetDate, u.address as Address, c.contact_name as Name, c.cardNo as IdCard, c.tel as Tel, c.phone as Phone, c.email as Email, c.QQ as QQ, c.memo as Memo from unit u, contacts c where u.contacts_id = c.id and u.id = #{id}

select u.id as Id, u.unit_name as UnitName, u.province as Province, u.city as City, u.business_type as BusinessType, u.in_net_date as InNetDate, u.address as Address, u.permit_word as PermitWord, u.permit_num as PermitNum, u.permit_date as PermitDate, c.contact_name as Name, c.cardNo as IdCard, c.tel as Tel, c.phone as Phone, c.email as Email, c.QQ as QQ, c.memo as Memo from unit u, contacts c where u.contacts_id = c.id and u.id = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT LEFT(satrt_time,4) AS result_year FROM arrange WHERE arrange_type = 1 AND route_id = #{routeId} ORDER BY result_year DESC
SELECT DISTINCT LEFT(satrt_time,7) AS result_month FROM arrange WHERE arrange_type = 1 AND route_id = #{routeId} AND satrt_time LIKE concat(#{year},'%') ORDER BY result_month
SELECT leave_number AS leaveNumber,total_number AS totalNumber FROM arrange WHERE arrange_type = 1 AND route_id = #{routeId} AND satrt_time LIKE concat(#{year},'%')
